TopicTitle: Bought from Steam, but Crashes when starting

Articles.Content: I’ve experienced a problem, I have Windows 7, but my KSP does not want to load, every time I click it, it instantly crashes, I do not know what to do, To me it was a waste of money since I bought it before the sale ended (Jul 10th for 249.0 Pesos) I need help, can somebody please give me a hand?

Welcome to the forum and sorry to hear about your problem, @PhilippineSpaceProgram.

Have you tried verifying your local game files? This explains how:
https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=2037-QEUH-3335
